name: degrease
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to remove grease (= oil or soft fat) from a surface or object: To degrease a sauce is to skim the fat off its surface. The solvents used to degrease aircraft engines are hazardous.
More examplesFewer examplesRub down the window frame with abrasive paper then degrease the surface with white spirit.The stock is usually seasoned, strained, degreased, and concentrated so it can be used as a base for sauces and soups.If I didn't have a bad knee I'd be up on the kitchen counter degreasing the cooker hood.Degrease your bike chain, and clean the cogs with a stiff-bristled brush.These products are used to degrease skin and reduce sebum.
